website_summaries.verdict: Shed some light on your pet's little messes; the light can also be used to detect currency and valid IDs, and spot bed bugs and other insects.
pros: Includes 51 UV LEDs, rated for 12 years of service
Can also detect bed bugs, whitening agents and human fluids
Does not react to known sources of urine, such as pads or litter boxes
cons: UV wavelength too high for urine detection
Detects water, but not pet stains

customer_reviews.title: BE VERY CAREFUL
customer_reviews.text: NEVER take this into a hotel room... just don't... please please don't.... it's everywhere... just... everywhere... what happened in here? How many films have been shot here... oh my goodness, it's on the tv... how'd they get it on the tv.... I'm just going to sleep in my car....
customer_reviews.author: Chad Mangione

customer_reviews.title: Worst thing I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing I've ever bought. My house is a pig sty. This light is fantastic but it shows EVERYTHING. I thought my house was clean. Turn off the lights at night, shine thus light and be prepared to be shocked. Tomorrow, I have a date with a bucket of ammonia and water.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B. Carson

customer_reviews.title: Get if you want to know where the smell is coming from
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is disgusting!!! I hope this isn't all just cat pee that shows up cause there is a lot! I bought this cause I thought my cat was peeing in one room and couldn't find the exact spot so I bought this. Found the spot and more. Would recommend. Picture is the same spot (fyi I am a very clean person)
customer_reviews.author: Momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Great for finding radioactive depression-era glass!
customer_reviews.text: This light is awesome for those that collect the radioactive depression-era glass. Uranium glass fluoresces bright green under ultraviolet light, and you can tell the non-radioactive from the radioactive glass even in the daylight. Just take it in to the antique store and have a ball!
customer_reviews.author: Brian V.

customer_reviews.title: Use at your own discretion, at the darkest hour
customer_reviews.text: Imagine my surprise to discover that during my heavily sedated but entirely restful nights of sleep, my sweet, darling kitties had been luring feral animals into the house through the cat door, quietly murdering them, and consuming the helpless creatures in the dark of night. They're not doing a thorough job scrubbing down afterwards which is why everything on the walls under two feet high looks like worse than the White Rabbit scene from "The Game" because of the additional biological material. On the other hand, I've got a better sense as to why my house never smells quite "fresh."
customer_reviews.author: juan ovakyn

customer_reviews.title: Good for blacklight posters, completely useless for pet urine
customer_reviews.text: I did this in pitch darkness as advised. I saw white spots and patches on the rug and floors but no proof what it was from. Could be old puke, could be just old stains. I deem this completely useless for detecting urine. It didn't even show up in the litter box where I was sure there was some!
customer_reviews.author: Escher's Paradox

customer_reviews.title: Be prepared  Will make you want new carpet
customer_reviews.text: Some of the reviews stating “you may not want to see with this light” are true. Oh my goodness!!! I think it shows more than just urine though. We had a ceiling leak and it showed where it was, how well I DIDNT get the walls cleaned. I knew my cat was peeing in a certain spot, but I didn’t know how bad it was. Also, I bought the orange odor remover that is suggested with it. One of the reviews said it removed the odor And the cat wouldn’t go back to that area. Ditto!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rondalbond

customer_reviews.title: I can easily see the beam on my back fence from my ...
customer_reviews.text: I immediately nicknamed this "The Ultra Violet Light Cannon of The Apocalypse"! I can easily see the beam on my back fence from my back patio about 40ft away. Wavelength is perfect for making scorpions look like they were injected with neon! Shipping was quick and quality is very good, especially considering the price. If I decide I need another, I won't need to research to find a better one!
customer_reviews.author: Just a guy in AZ

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! I bought this to spot my cat's messes, and I found one on the floor that I had no clue was there. Good tool that I will be using a lot. It doesn't show everything, but it shows plenty
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Wenger

customer_reviews.title: DOES. NOT. WORK.
customer_reviews.text: I’m one of the many people this DOES NOT WORK for. It highlights lint, white items, but not urine. Here it is shining into the week-old used litter box and nothing glowed. Total disappointment and frustrating because I need to find the spot that stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Collieran

customer_reviews.title: there is no easy to locate site or phone number to get the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product worked the first two times we tried it, within 2 months of purchase. We attempted to use it approximately three months after purchase and the LED lights had all died. I determined that by replacing all the batteries with fresh ones and the unit still did not work, Very disappointing, AND . . . there is no easy to locate site or phone number to get the issue resolved. FOLLOWUP - To Vanksytech's credit, they responded very quickly to my review that the product stopped working and have issues me a new Black Light Flashlight, at no charge. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey rothstein

customer_reviews.title: For both conventional & non conventional uses!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I color/draw a lot with Gelly Roll pens that come alive under black light and this comes in handy while I'm away from home. WELL. After watching the show Hotel Impossible, I started using it to find stains on bed sheets, carpets and bathroom surfaces. This light is INCREDIBLE! It can detect even the tiniest of stains/spots! I was shocked to see what I couldn't see before. (Now I think I might have been better living in denial...this thing can cause an obsession! LOL) It's a LITTLE heavier than it looks and I wish it had come with some sort of carrying case but this is worth a 10 star rating. I don't travel without it!
customer_reviews.author: AbbyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Bright and lives up to claims!
customer_reviews.text: Lives up to the claims on the selling page. Anything with optical brighteners is blastingly white. Urine that goes back to our dog six years ago shows up along baseboards & walls even though not visible to naked eye and the areas have been washed regularly-- kind of a mixed blessing! Useful to photography collectors who wish to establish that prints were made prior to the introduction of optical brighteners in the 1950s and thus in all newer photographic papers. Older prints do not glow. So, great for spotting forgeries (and probably in other applications as well).
customer_reviews.author: Corson Hirschfeld

customer_reviews.title: Scorpion Searchlight!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this blacklight to spot scorpions on our new property in Texas. It works great! I can't believe how brightly scorpions shine under the UV light. Very handy! The light seems to be of solid construction and is plenty bright enough to do what we bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Talitha Darling

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I would give this led black light flashlight more stars if I could. My nose told me there was urine somewhere in our family room, but I was unable to find it until the day my flashlight arrived. I waited until dark and found it almost immediately. I even found some very old urine spots. This flashlight came with batteries and is heavier than I expected. I would highly recommend this flashlight if you are looking to find urine.
customer_reviews.author: littlefoot

customer_reviews.title: Useful garden tool!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these flashlights based on reviews stating they were useful in locating horned worms on tomato plants. My son and I went out hunting last night and discovered the claims are true. We had a great time spying out not only horned worms, but other worms snacking on our peppers. Now our tomato and pepper plants are saved and our chickens get a nice snack.
customer_reviews.author: A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work at all for finding urine stains!
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I could find the exact places my cats had been peeing in the attic, and to help find the 'pee patches' my new puppy has left when I wasn't looking. It didn't work for either. Even when I shined it right at a fresh pee puddle, nothing. It picked up random pieces of paper and fluff, but completely failed to show urine stains, old or new. I'm very disappointed, especially because I missed the return date.
customer_reviews.author: DharmaDuck Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - but beware!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Definitely works as described! Helpful for seeing where you miss when steam cleaning carpet. ***Beware for the OCD though....... Thankfully I had new carpet installed 6 months before I got my rescue dog and am in pretty good shape. Had I had this light with the old carpet from previous owner however, I could have easily driven myself insane! Watch what you ask for before ordering - you cannot "un-see" what you discover and the old adage "ignorance is bliss" might be worth a thought.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: see what you're missing!
customer_reviews.text: Where is the smell coming from? you wonder, as you furiously spray the pet-store cleaner, and scrub down your carpet and furniture to no avail. Enter the UV Flashlight! In a very dark room, shine this magical flashlight on the floor/walls/furniture. Any dried urine (or other suspicious stains) will light up like a Christmas tree! Easy to locate, clean, and eliminate the stinky residue. -- (bonus: This process helped us realize that our dog was lonely-peeing downstairs when we were out of the house. Now we block off the downstairs before we leave the house, problem solved.)
customer_reviews.author: SunnyKrissy

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective and Very Disturbing
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly effective, rugged, and simple to use in finding bacteria, "organic stains", and other unmentionable residues. They show up as bright white spots or smears against a violet background. We use flashlight (torch) when staying at hotels, along with a cannister of antiseptic wipes. Simply turn off the room lights, hold this flashlight in one hand, and a wiper in the other. Start with the bathroom. You will quickly see what your visible light eyes do not see. But be prepared. You might get so sick that you will check out. Just don't blame the Vansky company and its black light flashlight. You've been warned.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: USE IT WITH SUNGLASSES for urine detection.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical due to some reviews saying it didn't detect their cat urine since it is 395 nM and not 385 or 365. I did have trouble at first but then had the idea to put on black sunglasses to fade the violet hues and tada. I could see everything! Found the spots on the carpet were she peed and spots on the wall where she has been spraying. Happier than I thought I'd be and works better than the tiny one I got with my urine cleaning kit. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for finding dog accidents
customer_reviews.text: We have had a pet rescue dog for about a month at my house. She had a couple of accidents when we first got here home, but we were worried she had found a secret spot to go. The room was smelling doggy and we though that might be the cause. This light projects a very bright, large beam (turn the lights out). It's true UV meaning things fluoresce just like using a black light. In our bathroom we could see traces of all kinds of things. But except for a pawprint on the carpet when she stepped in one pee accident our room was clean. Good dog. This light is fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: The Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Yep, I told you so!
customer_reviews.text: Worth it just to say "I told you so!" to my boyfriend, who didn't believe his precious widdle princesses (cats) were peeing on stuff. Now we can find the messes easier and clean them up better. He's still in denial though. The wrist string broke almost immediately, but it didn't impact usage, so no big deal. Besides the cleaning aspect of it, it's also just fun to look at stuff with it, I never knew the world had so many....stains...
customer_reviews.author: R T

customer_reviews.title: OMG!! What are all these colors?
customer_reviews.text: Well, yes it shows up splatters and stains. If used on fresh urine, nothing will show...it has to dry a bit first to show up. Also, a bit confusing because bright blue...what is THAT? Vs. Yellow. I want to see where the urine is before it dries. Maybe they could include a color chart for identifying what colors mean...? Also they tell you protective glasses are recommended AFTER you receive the item. If I had known that, I would have gotten the one that COMES with the glasses. So, not sure how useful these are.
customer_reviews.author: ShaRona

customer_reviews.title: Exposes What The Naked Eye Can’t See
customer_reviews.text: This thing is unbelievable. Moved into a rental where the carpets had just been shampooed, and it smelled pretty bad. Ordered the light to find the problem, and it exposed multiple dozens of pet stains not visible to the naked eye, all over the hallway carpet. Clearly the prior occupants kept their dogs in this area. Fast forward...was searching for homes to buy. Brought the flashlight with me when looking at 20+ homes. It helps you determine how bad a home with prior pets is. Works great to use with your home inspection too. Again, this light exposes what the naked eye can’t. Works perfectly, great prices, and achieves the intended outcome. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: K. Deans

customer_reviews.title: Great Black Light
customer_reviews.text: Oh, Lord. Shining this light in the dark makes my house look like a crime scene. It not only shows dried urine on the bathroom wall by the toilet but also food splatters and leftover wallpaper paste in my kitchen. This is very strong and heavy duty compared to the other one I bought years ago. And batteries are included!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Great antiquing tool
customer_reviews.text: I take mine to flea markets, thrift shops, and antique malls...a lot of really valuable glass can be identified by shining a black light on it -if it glows, or fluoresces, it is likely worth something! It can also help find minuscule cracks, nicks, chips, or repair jobs you might otherwise overlook. It can also highlight spots the previous owner touched up with modern paint. This one is small and lightweight (which is awesome because I want more room in my bag for marathon treasure seeking!) and does the job very well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M. White

customer_reviews.title: Get ready to laugh/cry/panic... you thought your house was clean then this sucker shows up 😱
customer_reviews.text: First of all 🤮 I bleach all my grout and clean with Clorox. This light just intensified this times 300! I thought my house was spotless until I use it! I haven’t cleaned this bathroom in a week but come on. This is the worst/best purchase I’ve bought. Excuse me while I put on my hazmat suit while I deep clean this house AGAIN... I mean what else are we supposed to do during this pandemic. I’m ripping everything up. Kill staining everything and painting. Haha but it’s fun to see what you will find 😂😂😂 get ready for a laugh/cry/panic. BUY THIS LITTLE FLASH LIGHT ITS AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Tnlady84

customer_reviews.title: We ordered this because our new kitten had ringworm and ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this because our new kitten had ringworm and a black light will illuminate the fungus. It was helpful to track it until it was eradicated. Reasonable price too.
customer_reviews.author: meerkat49

customer_reviews.title: Used for my Funko Pops.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light to charge my glow in the dark Funko Pops, it works incredibly well and depending on which Pop it is charges them immediately or in a short period of time. Makes them glow beautifully. Until I can get a nice display made with UV LED strips installed this is my cheap way to see the Pops glow when I want. Bright light for the price, feels a bit cheap though. I'd bet if it fell from anything higher than 5 feet on tile or hard ground this flashlight would not turn on again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave W.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t fall for it as a urine detector.
customer_reviews.text: Bologna! I can’t believe I fell for this as a urine detector. We were purchasing a house that smelled HORRIBLY like cat pee. Like hold your breath so you don’t pass out bad. Bad. Bad. Bad. Anyway, bought this to our inspection and my husband thought we might just replace the flooring upstairs because there were no spots showing on the carpet in the basement. When we closed on the house and ripped out the basement carpet there were PUDDLES of pee. It was so bad we had to rip out drywall and this light didn’t pick up even a small amount of untie spots prior.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan

customer_reviews.title: Recommend! Kinda....
customer_reviews.text: As a mom to three teenage boys, I bought this to show them the true horror of our one and only bathroom. I am desperately trying to find the culprit of the “Not Me” phantom pee-r, little did I know what I would find during my quest. I won’t even describe not only the amount, but places I found urine... seriously, how?! I made the mistake one night to explore my house with this black light. Just. don’t. I am now knee deep in Clorox, sponges and paper towels.
customer_reviews.author: Justanaveragegirl

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was terrified to use this the first time, specially in the pantry where Miss Fussypants goes. She will sometimes hang her backside over the edge of the litter box so I have frequent messes to clean up. I was pleasantly surprised to find that the floor was not as bad as I expected. This little light is a huge help in finding the spots that need to be cleaned. I'm glad ordered it and would recommend it to all pet owners who's pets have accidents or are just plain spiteful and go where they want.
customer_reviews.author: JAYBEE

customer_reviews.title: Does Just What It's Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's a UV light and if you don't want to realize just how many potty training spots you've actually missed, you probably shouldn't buy it. The puppy pad zone looked like a scene from CSI. That being said, it works great. As a tip, try to wait to use it until you can get minimal lighting in the room. It works best in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S.

customer_reviews.title: A Mystery For Sure
customer_reviews.text: Great in darker areas and night time as you’d expect. Found hundreds of millipedes in the woods behind my house thanks to this. And some mushrooms too, which was pretty cool. I also use it for curing resin to attach mini figurines on clear acrylic bases, which it’s great for. Stands up on its own and everything so it works for tall things hat won’t fit under the nail lamp. Tried to use it during auctions to examine the condition of items but it didn’t have much input in those lighting conditions. That night I learned I need to get a new yoga ball though. No idea what happened on it and I don’t much care to know either...
customer_reviews.author: Dana Klats

customer_reviews.title: This light would be a good deal at twice the price.
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this item to be made so we’ll at this price point. The light is very well made, and works perfectly. The up is very bright, and does everything I want to do with it. The only thing to pay attention to is that the battery holder does have to be inserted in the right direction, but this is not a flaw. Also, shipping was very quick, as I received it two days after placing the order.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Reeder

customer_reviews.title: It will scare you
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to see if I could spot urine stains in my carpet from my puppy. Needless to say, what shows up with this light will scare you! It is remarkable and I have borrowed it out to friends and family to use as well. I have paid to have my carpets professionally cleaned to remove urine spots and I can still see them afterwards, so I know they didn't really get it completely removed. Great product. Now I need to find a better carpet cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: Angela in MN

customer_reviews.title: I used to like my old 21 LED UV flash (from a different ...
customer_reviews.text: I used to like my old 21 LED UV flash (from a different manufacturer). I lost the old one so I bought this Vansky UV flash. I give only 3 stars for this product because this flash light consumes too much battery power. After using about 15 minutes, the light became significantly dimmed. For the same kind of job (detecting urine spot on the carpet), I would rather have a smaller flashlight with less bulbs. I don't want to replace AA batteries almost after each use, which cost me a lot, eventually.
customer_reviews.author: SerinUI

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all
customer_reviews.text: Was so so so exited for this.. I have 3 cats and 3 dogs, and sometimes they can make a mess. I shined the light on a part of our rug where I know for a fact my puppy peed, and nothing showed up. I put the light in the litter box over a fresh spot where one of my cats went to the bathroom, and nothing showed up.. it does light up things like lint and material that has a color that any black light would make shine.. did NOT work for urine detection. Will be returning ASAP. So disappointed, was very excited to use this...
customer_reviews.author: Gracie Floyd

customer_reviews.title: This product shined great for about 30 seconds then became dim
customer_reviews.text: This product shined great for about 30 seconds then became dim. I replaced the batteries it came with, thinking that was the problem, with new energizer batteries. Was still dim.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Gapusan

customer_reviews.title: Too good it's sickening!
customer_reviews.text: I'm disgusted. This thing works so well. I'd give it 100 stars if I could. I got this item today and closed the blinds in the smelly bedroom. Yikes. I'm just happy the owners before us splurged on the fancy carpet pad which has the plastic sheet above it that isn't penetrated by liquids. I've sprayed most of the spots and now waiting for my husband to get back with more enzyme spray and a professional carpet cleaner (we do have a cleaner, but let's be serious, this requires a professional cleaning by a top of the line machine). I used this product right around noon and it works well even though the bedroom isn't pitch black.
customer_reviews.author: RemyJax

customer_reviews.title: works ok in dark, but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: we bought this to identify pet stains (cat vomit) on the carpet, etc. it works well if the room is dark. unfortunately this unit did not last long. didn't last long enough as much as the first battery set it was put in. what good is a 45 year LED reliability if the electronics supporting the light breaks (most likely switch since the light just stopped turning on). not impressed with its electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Shining a light on humanity’s stained souls
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I was suspicious I wasn’t getting my dogs vomit out of the rug. Also I thought this was really cool, very CSI. Hopefully when the world goes back to normal I’m gonna bring this with me when I go to a hotel, and see how clean the sheets are. It has worked well for picking up doggy stains, also stains in the bathroom bedroom and kitchen. It’s gross... I’m not gonna lie. The bathroom walls look like the set for Carrie 😨. I always read the 1 Star reviews and inevitably there are products that don’t work well. I see that as a byproduct of mass production.... most will be good, but some will be garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Linna Zorro

customer_reviews.title: Bright white light washes out UV light
customer_reviews.text: I had great expectations, but maybe I have set the bar too high. The perm black light, for me, goes back to my childhood in the mid 1960's, and a black light was a dark (when off) purple to black florescent light, that when you turned it on, only the day-glow colors light up, and nothing else. With this light, you might as well leave all the lights on, as it throws so much white light, that it washes out whatever you are looking for (in this case, cat urine). So, yes the light is bright, but not in the color range you are looking for. Maybe it is just the technology (LED vs florescent).
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: Check out your filthy house!
customer_reviews.text: This works great- I've had some sneaky peeing dogs and needed to find the spots. The location on the area rug lit up! Plus I can see where my big dogs slobber about. Just for 'fun' the kids and I decided to check out the bathrooms and carpet as well. Ugh- if you want to see what you haven't cleaned- then go ahead. I have 2 teenage boys and am always on them about the bathroom messes- this was perfect to prove my point! Yes- the area should be dark to get a better look- but that goes for any black light. This was powerful enough to light up my whole garage! For the price- you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great When Shined Close to Troublesome Areas
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Price, Works to find areas that need clean-up, Easy to use Cons: Short distance usage only I was able to test this within my bathroom and found that it does illuminate troublesome areas and can help certify after clean-up that messes and stains have been removed. After owning this for a bit of time now, I can say that it is quite durable and should easily get the job done for those looking to make sure their homes are extra clean.
customer_reviews.author: sharper821

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for pee, works for other stuff.
customer_reviews.text: It did not work for cat pee. I purchased it to find pee in the garage but didn’t notice anything obvious. Did it at night following the instructions. It does find everything else though. I decided not to return it because it will show you everything, including dust. It highlights all but you’ll see obvious things that you can’t see with the naked eye that are obviously spills or something. We took it around the house and used it. Bottom line, did not work for finding some cat pee in the garage but it does work for finding lots of other stuff. Another cleaning tool in the arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: SAMAS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For What We Used It For
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to see if our senior dogs were having accidents in the house. WOW!!! These painted an ugly picture. Not only do we clean the house but we have a cleaning lady every week. We did not realize how many accidents they are having. The carpet cleaner got a workout and we now keep up with it every week. This light does not miss anything. If you really want to know how much you are missing in the kitchen, bathroom, or anywhere else- shine this around (not just on the floor) in the pitch black you will be horrified. It really does let you know where you are missing all of the spots.
customer_reviews.author: M. Azzaro

customer_reviews.title: Like a Neon Christmas!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Just be careful with your eyes. I've noticed if I use it for more then a minute or so at a time my eyes start to bother me. It is so bright and has lasted a long time. Takes 3 AA batteries and they last a really long time. It is so bright you could spot a stain in the dark from 30ft away. I've used it to find jewlery at estate sales, check for leaks in my engine compartment of my car and stains when cleaning carpets. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: William Mertens, Jr

customer_reviews.title: This light definitely works!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, this works way too well! I knew there were some urine stains and residue from hairballs my daughter's cat spit up, but I wasn't aware to what extent. I waited until it was dark outside, turned on the flashlight, and began in the living room. Ick---a trail of spots leading from the living room to the dining room and around the DR table! My daughter's bedroom was just as bad. After seeing all of that, it made me want to tear out all of the carpeting and buy new, but that's not really an option. Instead, I'll go to Amazon and find some highly recommended pet stain remover. I would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vottofan

customer_reviews.title: Finds the urine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light for when our eternally- learning-to-pottery-train dogs urinate on the floor. We were uncertain when our floors had liquid on them whether or not it was from the dogs or just some water. This detects the urine very well. When I shined it on our basement carpeted floor it looked like a Jackson Pollock painting. But the carpeting has been in the basement for quite a few years and the previous home owner had dogs that seemed to do whatever they pleased. I have not used it to find bugs yet., so I cannot say whether or not it works well in that arena.
customer_reviews.author: Calman

customer_reviews.title: Crazy Bright. Find Stuff You Don't Want To. Well Built.
customer_reviews.text: First, you need to be in dark to use anything UV. I bought this for finding critters on tomato and squash plants, particularly caterpillars. Past dusk, went out to my garden, I found some eggs, they shined like a 70's party.... later learned they were stinkbugs, lol. Then, went through the house on sitting places and wall surfaces. The most disturbing part were seeing sitting surfaces, like an office chair and couch, crazy... ewww what we saw. Don't buy this if you want to find gross stuff under your butt, or in your face. Buy it for whatever, it works. Yes, it's crazy cool!
customer_reviews.author: Sasqui

customer_reviews.title: Well built,
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this UV torch to harden UV sensitive glue on the glass of a touch screen that was broken. I have not had the chance to use it yet. It is well built and all of the LED's are of equal brightness. The next reason that I bought it was for night trekking through rainforest. Many animals and minerals are fluorescent. I believe that this torch is built well enough to take the harsh environment of camping, I would buy it again and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Completed satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted one of these for years! It seemed every UV flashlight I came across had some weird fatal flaw written in the reviews. So one night, my friend was working the door at a bar, and he was using this to check IDs. I noticed how good it was, took a picture of it, and ended up purchasing it. Very cool product! Really, not many drawbacks. I have not owned this for more than a few weeks, so check other reviews perhaps for battery life - if you plan on using it a lot. It's high powered, so perhaps a lower powered one would work right for you.
customer_reviews.author: C2sRUX

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE -REPLACEMENT  NEW UNIT ARRIVED TODAY AND IS PERFECT - THANKS GREAT SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in DEC 2019 so its four months old and the nice blue UV light it had is now a dim white flashlight basically useless, BUT after contact with Yeri at VANSKY they sent me a new one that is performing perfectly and communication was appreciated and handled swiftly . Anyone or anything can fail but how it is handled is more important than whatever the problem was, it's working just fine and I can recommend them to anyone... you remember when someone righted something more than the problem themselves.... Thanks again...
customer_reviews.author: aljacobs

customer_reviews.title: Works as stated...`
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the wife.....she wasn't sure about this at first since the Wife was worried about the Cat marking her new area rug. She tested it in daylight couldn't see anything. Told her to wait until dark out and did. That did it...the Flash Light found where the cat marked, she treated the soil spot with pet soil formula then we extracted with Pet carpet machine on her new Rug. Were both happy now that this little UV flashlight helps us locate the soil spot and destroy the odor without getting on our hands and knees sniffing around. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jellyfish

customer_reviews.title: Shows you what you'd rather not know!
customer_reviews.text: My living room sometimes smells like urine, so I got this gadget to find out where to clean. O.M.G. Obviously, the people who lived here before me had animals that used the rug as their toilet. Bright spots showed up everywhere!! I'm working on using a stain and odor eliminator and diffusing orange essential oils to get rid of the odors and hoping that I don't have to have the rug replaced. My animals obviously thought, "Oh, here's the bathroom!" whenever they walked over those areas. I can use this when I shampoo the rug to make sure I'm getting all the areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: HOLY SH$T, LOOK AT THIS MESS😮
customer_reviews.text: This should be a ‘must own’ for every home! I thought I was cleaning good, HA! Look at these before (in normal light) and after (using this light)-GROSS. Urine sprays EVERYWHERE THANKS BOYS!🙄 This light is cheap and SUPER useful, use it in your bathrooms, to detect animal urine-heck how helpful would this be when you’re touring homes to buy? Your Realtor may not like it but who cares, it will detect all the hidden crap in the carpets and actually on all surfaces. Take it to your friends party and have fun turning the lights out and checking out the floors. Better yet, don’t do that. Just buy it today, seriously. Then prepare to be grossed out.
customer_reviews.author: H. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item not really knowing how well it would work based on other reviewers. Some said works great and some not so much. I think this is awesome! It even worked well in daylight in a room with large windows. I was able to easily find pet stains and treat them. I'm sure it would work even better in total darkness. My elderly dog would often have accidents in the house, and they would sometimes happen when I was not in the room so they were hard to find. This device makes it so easy, I'm really glad I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ali

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, very useful.
customer_reviews.text: Used this to track down pet stains. Worked great showed tons of spots I was not aware. Made sniffing the carpet far easier. Used in my bathroom and was mortified. Definitely can work to show you how dirty your house is. Would recommend. The battery compartment took a second to figure out. It takes AA but looks like it could hold a C. Probably specified on the directions but I didn’t bother. It’s a solid buy you won’t regret.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Not Good!
customer_reviews.text: This light shows nothing! I marked the spot on my rug where I caught my puppy peeing. That night i turned off all the lights and looked for the pee stain. Nothing showed up. I should have heeded the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Cee

customer_reviews.title: Discover you disgust
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, so I do not recommend because you will realize exactly how disgusting your house it. I helped us find where the cat peed, but also helped us find so much more.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Worked Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This light did exactly what the seller said it would do. Find 2 week old dog urine stains. I did a favor for a friend by taking care of his well trained, house broken little dog for a week. A week after the dog left I began smelling urine orders. Especially on rainy humid days. I bought this light and found 7 spots on my 3 year old dining room carpet. I"m not sure yet what I’m going to do with the carpet but I am sure that’s last pet ever coming in my house. Again this light did what it was supposed to do right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: WC Fields

customer_reviews.title: Bad Cat Mysteries Revealed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a BAD CAT. This helped me find a LOT of wall spray. HORRIFYINGLY, it also found tiny bloody paw prints of a mouse killed by the cat months ago that were invisible to the eye. Had been cleaned with fantastik, but blood proteins still visible with black light. Used AntiIcky Poo and they were removed. Excellent product. Use to find evidence of murder, cat pee, or Bill Clinton.
customer_reviews.author: Ducky McRuckles

customer_reviews.title: Like others are saying
customer_reviews.text: Like others are saying, don't use this if you don't want to know the truth about what's in your house. UGH. Get ready to clean. NOT for OCD people. But it is bright and solid. Can't comment on durability since I haven't had it long but so far so good. Next time I travel I'm taking it to check out the hotel room (ohhhh boy).
customer_reviews.author: Gregory H.

customer_reviews.title: WOW! DIDN'T KNOW THAT WAS THERE!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs began 'marking' our house not long after we moved in. We scrubbed each spot, but wondered how to locate any that might have dried already. The house is fully carpeted, so we thought we'd better see what's happening. We were amazed at the number of stains we found and were able to target for deep cleaning. Many stains came with the house and, while this light sees urine, it also sees other things too. Some of our stains were much to big to be a dog's accident. Fortunately, the dogs have stopped their quest to make the inside of our house their territory. Great household tool, especially if you have carpet.
customer_reviews.author: JoeRass

customer_reviews.title: Great at finding doggie pee pee spots
customer_reviews.text: Great little blacklight! I read an article about using black-lights to find doggie pee pee spots. I'm glad I did buy this thing! I regularly clean up the occasional spots my dogs make... but I wasn't aware of the ones I was missing! I was able to spot treat them with an enzyme cleaner here on the Amazons and then shampoo them with the Big Green Machine! I came back to check with the light... and all spots were gone! I would NOT however take this with you to a hotel room. I'm sure what you would find in every room would scare you to the point of leaving.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Right wavelength for finding pet messes; good heft
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes these UV lights are advertised for finding organic stains but don't seem to be the correct UV wavelength to do the job. They are bright but detect almost nothing except lint on the floor. This one is quite bright and shows up problem spots nicely. Good size and weight - not easy to lose and a pleasant heft in the hand. You should probably mark yours with colored tape or marker or a tag on the lanyard, so you don't mistake it for a regular flashlight when you need one.
customer_reviews.author: M. SweeneyTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised when I saw how many times I had been hit and where, but the light showed up the smallest spots. The room does not have to be dark either. It shows the spots in a dimly lit room; so when I spot cleaned, I knew exactly where to clean. After spot cleaning and shampooing the carpet, the spots didn't go away completely; but they were a little lighter. I knew how well the cleaner worked. Even though the cleaners say they remove urine, they really don't. If anyone knows a product that actually removes the stain, I would love to know what it is. This light will definitely let you know if it works.
customer_reviews.author: T Spurg

customer_reviews.title: This thing is seriously cool.
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the photographs do not do any of these justice. Its a bit fun see which parts of which if any figures light up. Zinorgres electricity, akantors eyes like he is in rage mode. Let's not forget that this activates glow in the dark material. Also, who knew the switch joy cons glowed so much, great for uv raves or wherever. Even out side of cleaning, this can add a whole new dimension to photography or just random fun. Side note, i quickly discovered how much all the dust around lights up. Dust before inviting people over to play with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kuro

customer_reviews.title: This one is bright enough to ACTUALLY find the urine spots
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few black light flashlights but others failed to be bright enough to find the urine spots. This one does a great job in low light conditions. That means you can actually get to the spots that cause odors. It is also a good party entertainment as with low lighting the white on everyone really shines. I would buy this again. As I walk a around the room the carpet, or wall will show yellow streaks or spots quite clearly showing you where to scrub. Beats scrubbing the WHOLE carpet or wall!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great light for checking cleanliness
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to see how dirty my bathrooms were before and after cleaning. This light picked up everything and after cleaning showed me how clean they were, and if I needed to clean another spot. Great product for the price highly recommend if you want to see how dirty a room is and then how clean it becomes.
customer_reviews.author: joe tremper

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I am the ashamed parent of a boy who's been the good boy letting me know he wants to go out and got played all these 6 months 😆🙄 The flash light is lightweight, judge the brightness from the picture (pretty good). However, i am rating it 3 stars because I put 3 brand new batteries and the light started getting weaker and weaker in only 5 minutes. Not sure if it draines the battery or something is wrong with the flash light. however my boys #1craftwork is very much visible....Btw, the item deleiverd 15 minutes ago.
customer_reviews.author: Almara

customer_reviews.title: You can never unsee what this light shows you
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light because we got a male cat and after we came home from a vacation he must have been stressed(despite being cared for while we were gone) because we could smell his musk. The problem was that we could smell it but not find it. Got this light and found his markings easily. I was so amazed by this light I took it into the bathroom. Just cleaned a couple of days ago and it opened my eyes to everything I missed. Now I'm no longer blind to messes I can't see. Works really well!
customer_reviews.author: MurFam12

customer_reviews.title: I like this Black light flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: It shows up things that will make you rethink how you clean. I bought it to find urine spots on my cats litter mat. And boy does it. It really made me...not so happy to see what my birds cage wheels have done to the tile floor. And I cleaned the floor every night with a Clorox wipe and also steamed cleaned the floors. But with this flashlight it makes my floor look the 70's. Put all those spots on the ceiling, and add a black light ...and we'll have a Disco party! LOL But really needs to be brighter or bigger, I suppose. That's why the rating is a 4. Because it only show's a small area.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: NOW I CAN SEE THE SCORPIONS
customer_reviews.text: We've had a rather annoying issue with Bark Scorpions getting into the house this season. We live in the Sonoran Desert and it's been extra rainy this year and the scorpions have been an issue for the first time in 10 years. The scorpions seem to always been in the hallway between the bedroom and the bathroom on the floor. I've nearly stepped on several. So I ordered this flashlight and now I can visit the bathroom in the middle of the night, without my glasses and still see the little buggers before I step on them. It definitely lights them up in a bright green and the light is strong enough to cover a large area.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says it does
customer_reviews.text: You will be absolutely surprised what you will find in your bathroom with this light. Now is the time to buy. Make sure you have plenty of cleaning spray and a clean rag or wipes. But that's not all. If you act now you will also notice whats on your rugs, floors, walls, etc. Limited time...act now.
customer_reviews.author: Emond

customer_reviews.title: Still not sure if it really works.
customer_reviews.text: I got this in hopes we could discover where the new kitten went to the bathroom while we were litter training. I couldn't tell. I went outside with the dogs to see if I could identify where they peed. I couldn't. I went back outside a few minutes later and the light did show where they had gone. I think there is a window where this thing works. It isn't right when they pee and it isn't a couple of days later. Unfortunately, that's how long it took to get here so here we are.
customer_reviews.author: ckrapp

customer_reviews.title: What has been seen....cannot be unseen
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this unless you are prepared to remodel your home or at the very least....move. 3 dogs and we fortunately have tile, it’s not a big problem, but this did find a few spots where we didn’t know they had “gone”. Cleaned up quick and they haven’t gone back. This will also highlight some cleaning materials, soaps, some painted areas where cleaners have been used, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Damazon Prime

customer_reviews.title: Only buy this if you're ready to take a hard look at your house
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I felt like my dog had peed somewhere and I couldn't find it. Well, I found it! And then-some, unfortunately. You have to remind yourself that this makes all kinds of things look troublesome because it illuminates fuzz and whatnot, also. My kids were playing with it and pretty much broke it the day it came in the mail. I'll be buying another one to make sure my carpets are clean. But I suggest not shining it everywhere or you might never stop cleaning...
customer_reviews.author: ekp

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT SHOW URINE
customer_reviews.text: Does not show urine!!!! It will light up lint and neon colors but that's it. I shined it in cat box and nothing. The spot we caught the cat peeing at nothing. We thought maybe the cat was peeping other places so we got the light to double check but now we will never know. Will be returning!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Horrifying...but you really need this
customer_reviews.text: First, there is a BIG difference in what you will see in total darkness and low light. (Don't even bother during the day or in daylight.) Then, what you will see is at least 50% mystery CSI Bewildering God knows what???? (caulk, dust, some cleaners and laundry detergents, bananas...) Shine the light in a mirror and move your face close to the mirror and you will not know who is staring back at you! I could not even get to sleep. If you have pets you need this. If you have children you need this. Either way, you will have plenty to clean and keep you up at night.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Curran

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This blacklight flashlight is just big and powerful enough to be useful but small enough to be handy. I was surprised at the blacklight quality this thing produces. I expected a weak purple light but this really makes white and organic matter pop like some of the best blacklight bulbs I've purchased over the years. Mine arrived with three totally dead batteries but I like it so much I still gave it five stars. As some others have said be prepared for what you might see with this flashlight. You'll be creeped out by every bathroom and hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: texmln

customer_reviews.title: Oh. Dear. God.
customer_reviews.text: Holy Guacamole! I just received this today, took it into our guest bathroom and my jaw dropped! I knew potty training kids and puppy would result in some “bad spots” but this tool has been deeply disturbing for me today. It works! I’m frightened to continue on to any other area in the house!
customer_reviews.author: NightRN

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Well I based my purchase on other reviews. I have to agree if you don't want to see what's on your floors and walls then you may not want this item, however on the flip side it does let you see where you need to do deep cleaning. Has for bed bugs and other critters I don't have them so I can attest to the accuracy of this light for that use. The light does bring up any stains on walls, floors and furniture, bedding. I would say it is a good item to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bblor

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Everyone raved about this so I was sure this would find the source of the cat pee smell in my house. It did not. I actually caught her peeing. Turned the carpet over and shined the blacklight directly on the uncleaned spots.....nothing. so disappointing. Had I not already thrown the packaging away, this would be going back.
customer_reviews.author: CindyC1017

customer_reviews.title: Works! Look for light lavender color = urine
customer_reviews.text: At first I did not think it worked because I could smell urine on my hardwood floor but the light did not appear to pick anything up. Then I saw IT!!! By slowly moving the light close to the floor I saw a faint lavender color- when I moved the light way - just wood color and when back faint light purple = Urine!!! I don’t know why some people see it as dark - maybe it’s the chemistry of each dogs urine? My toy poodles urine is light purple under this light. So glad I figured this out so now I know where to spray the urine remover.
customer_reviews.author: sunmoon

customer_reviews.title: Ewww... Is that on my rug?
customer_reviews.text: My wife uses Natures Miracle to clean up after puppy accidents. It does a good job removing odors but this light showed that stains hide, even after a cleanup. I'm told that if you use a light like this in hotels you will find, ahem, DNA on the bedspreads and urine stains on most rugs. Ewww - wear slippers and NEVER sit on the bedspreads ! Want to know and aren't afraid to get grossed out? Get one and reach for the professional rug cleaners!
customer_reviews.author: Dom Miliano

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Like a lot of other reviews it did not work right out of the box. Took it apart and checked the connections and pulled the spring out a little and it still wouldn’t work like it should. Works this time, doesn’t work the next time. Poor build quality. When it worked it was really bright. That just wasn’t that often. Sent back for a refund. Don’t waste your time. You know it’s got problems when u buy it and u get an email from the company telling u it does work and make sure the batteries are in correctly before sending back... I’m a 30 year electrical worker. It’s not me it’s you...
customer_reviews.author: Gina D

customer_reviews.title: Not as bright as it really should be.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is no where near bright enough or wide enough to cover large areas, especially considering how wide the "lens" seems to be. While it functions well as a black light, you really have to use it in dark areas to really get the glow effect you need when searching for stains. Otherwise you have to be almost right on top of a stain to see it. I think I was expecting this thing to be blinding, but it isn't at all. Kinda disappointing, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: blackntanmomma

customer_reviews.title: Use sunglasses!
customer_reviews.text: Great light! Everything lit up brightly. I could not find any urine in the carpet. I knew it was there. After doing some research I threw on a pair of sunglasses and TA-DA! Little green puddles started catching my eye. So if you can’t see the pee, try some sunglasses. I read that amber colored glasses work best but mine were just standard.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal Wall

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: I think I was better off not knowing, but this light does an excellent job of highlighting where the dog had accidents on the carpet. Unfortunately once the deed is done it seems there's no putting the toothpaste back in the tube. Despite vigorous cleaning, including pretreatment and scrubbing, and shampooing with an extraction machine, the affected areas still light up like in a blaze of violet when illuminated. Under normal light, these spots are totally invisible so be careful what you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Buckwalter

customer_reviews.title: Only shows fresh (wet) urine stains
customer_reviews.text: I bought this UV light because I wanted to see if my dogs had been peeing on my living room rug. I turned off all the lights and shined the UV flashlight over the rug. Nothing showed up. Out of curiosity, I waited until my dog peed outside, and I shined the light where he peed. It was bright yellow!! A few hours later, I came back and shined the light in the same spot (where he previously peed), and nothing showed up. I am not sure yet if I will keep or return this UV flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Definitely finds body fluids!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I could find out where our puppy was peeing. Spots all over the floor and couches. Cleaned all those areas thoroughly. It got interesting when I went into the bathrooms (pee all over the place) shined it on comforters (haha) and surprisingly it fluoresced down into our heating vents and some spots on the kitchen walls where food has hit the wall, yet nothing appears to the naked eye. Apparently some molds also show up, as evidenced by the ducts.
customer_reviews.author: medicbiker

customer_reviews.title: Need to be in the dark
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised that this black light shows the cat urine on the wall quite easily - in total darkness. However, I have yet to be able to see the known cat urine on my couch - darkness or not. I can't believe I cleaned the couch that good with a non-enzyme product to remove all of it. This is worth the money but make sure you wear UV protection ... yes even in the dark. Without UV eye protection the black light does bother your eyes when looking at a white wall.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Augustine

customer_reviews.title: Tomato Hornworm hunting made easy!
customer_reviews.text: I know there are other uses for this thing but we used it to hunt Tomato Hornworms at night. For you in the Southwest it will also show scorpions at night as they, too, glow under UV light. Also, our two teenage sons love doing experiments with this and seeing what will, and will not glow, etc. There are loads of cool science videos on YouTube showing uses for this device and I'm sure it will be getting used for quite some time for all sorts of strange reasons in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Tanja M. Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This lets me find where cats have marked and where animals might have left stains or bleed from small fights or injuries. I can also track injured animals (at night) where strays might have fought and then hid to bring them some food, get them to shelter, and take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: Userblueone

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We had a professional carpet cleaner in with an expensive commercial-grade black light searching for spots before he gave us a quote. I ordered this, and it revealed the same spots with equal clarity. We have dogs and a cat, and though some reviewers have remarked that it may not work on cat urine, I couldn't really say. I do know that it easily revealed the same spots the cleaner had found. It is very bright, and easily worked from a standing position. I'm very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: jbrand88

customer_reviews.title: False hope!
customer_reviews.text: I own a pet grooming salon and thought this would be scary helpful due to the high traffic of dogs and their little legs lifting at every corner. When first using this, I gave myself a pat on the back for cleaning so well that there wasn't a single stain! Come to find out, it was not my cleaning, unfortunately. This product is useless! It does not show urine spots at all. To test this, I used it immediately after a dog peed, and it showed nothing! Nothing!!! Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Megzy0203

customer_reviews.title: Buy one!  It works!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great. I have a little dog who is used to going outside whenever he wanted to when I had a yard. Now we live in an apartment and I have to WALK him out so he has accidents occasionally. This little light really shows anything! Even the dirt I may have missed vacuuming! Every day I go around with my light and my Rocco&Roxie spray cleaner (which WORKS THE BEST) and wallah!! No more pee. I tried to take a pic but it won't show right with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: RobinTop Contributor: Coloring

product_meta.title: Vansky Flashlight Black Light 51 LED Blacklight Detector for Dog/Cat Urine,Dry Stains,Bed Bug, Matching with Pet Odor Eliminatornator, Eliminator, uv-2
feature_bullets: Find invisible stains: UV flashlight helps detect food stains and pet urine stains on rugs, carpets, and clothes that are otherwise invisible to the naked Eye. Not work well on cat urine
Versatile use: authenticate currency and official documents like drivers licenses or identify unwanted whitening agent in cosmetics
Perfect for outside use such as finding scorpions and minerals
Durable, high-quality lads: the 51 tenacious UV light LEDs have a lifespan of 15 years
Ultra-compact design: The pocket-size UV flashlight can be carried along to detect stains in your car or illuminate minerals, body art

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars9,915 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
